column1: Vincent Harris, a 54-year-old Navy veteran in Missouri, used to describe himself as a proud "deplorable." But Trump's coronavirus response has made him reconsider whether he'll vote for the president in 2020. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/trump-voters-coronavirus-older-middle-aged-americans_n_5ec6945cc5b66038194e65d4?ncid=engmodushpmg00000004 via @HuffPostPol
